title: [K-12] Aesthetic Education Design for Poetry Appreciation Using Multimedia

context.prior_knowledge: Basic poetry analysis and literary appreciation skills
context.additional_context: An environment enabling multimedia content creation and sharing via personal devices, emphasizing creative expression through learner collaboration.

learning_goals: Learners can analyze the impact of various visual designs (color/black-and-white) on aesthetic appreciation of poetry.
Learners can select multimedia appreciation strategies appropriate to their level of empathetic ability.
Learners can produce digital works that visually reinterpret emotional expressions in poetry through PBL team activities.
Learners can establish criteria for evaluating the connection between visual elements and poetic imagery through peer assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
